values: If you tie two things together, you fasten them with rope, string, etc.
The dog is used to being tied up.
n. 领带，领结；（绑扎东西用的）带子，绳子纽带；关系，联系（ties）不分胜负，平局
vt. & vi. 打结；系，缚，捆，扎（被动）束缚，约束，限制
vt. 与…相关
vi. （比赛中）打成平局，不分胜负
时态:ties，tied，tying

To tie is to fasten or secure something with a knot or other means.
A tie is a long, narrow piece of fabric that is worn around the neck and tied in a knot.
